name: Cooktopia
description:
Cooktopia is a singe-player third-person cooking simulator game where you work towards making the best burgers in the world!

Overview:


Welcome to Cooktopia, where your cooking dreams come true! Cooktopia is a video game where you cook in a cartoonish kitchen, have tons of fun, and aim to become a top chef. In this cooking adventure, you'll craft delicious dishes and work your way up to improve your skills and efficiency to the max!

Key Features:


  • Endless Culinary Creativity: A game where you can create different kind of burgers with fries, salads, and drinks! You have the chance in your hand to be the best master chef of all-time!

  • Realistic Cooking Mechanics: Experience the thrill of cooking with intuitive, physics-based controls. Slice and cook your way to becoming a culinary genius.

  • Stylized Environment: Immerse yourself in a stunning stylized kitchen to make yourself feel like you are inside the game.

  • Competitive Timer Mode: Complete the orders as fast as you can and become the best chef in the world of Cooktopia.
